Intro.Title: I'm a freelance front-end developer from Berlin who creates digital experiences that everyone likes to use.
Intro.Text: I passionately combine good design, technology, and innovation in all my projects, which I like to accompany from the first idea to release. Currently, I'm focused on the development of responsive user interfaces with React and I'm interested in JavaScript, Web Technologies, User Experience, Accessibility, Clean Code, and the Universe. And everything in between.

Technologies.Title: Technologies
Technologies.Text: Using a combination of cutting-edge technologies and reliable open-source software I build user-focused, performant apps and websites for smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

OpenSourceProjects.Title: Open Source
OpenSourceProjects.Text: I am passionate about open source software and like to give back to others.

Projects.Headline: useLocationState / useQueryState
Projects.Description: store and retrieve state in react from the browsers history using modern hooks

Projects.Headline: Wheel Gestures for Embla Carousel
Projects.Description: This plugin adds wheel interactions to the amazing Embla Carousel

Projects.Headline: Outer Hooks
Projects.Description: develop javascript modules/libs using hooks - outside of react

ClientsPartners.Title: Clients & Partners
ClientsPartners.Text: Over the past 10 years, I've worked with great teams for exciting clients to deliver a wide range of projects: from engaging touch interfaces to complex web applications.
